00008 namespace Explorer
00009 {
00021         class Traversal
00022         {
00023                 protected:
00024                         bool verbosity;
00025                         std::vector<Move> moves;
00026                         std::vector<int> cancellations;
00027 
00028                 public:
00029                         Traversal(const std::vector<std::pair<Move, Move> > &_moves): cancellations(_moves.size() * 2, -1)
00030                         {
00031                                 
00032                                 for(std::vector<std::pair<Move, Move> >::const_iterator it = _moves.begin(); it != _moves.end(); ++it)
00033                                 {
00034                                         if(it->first.fun)
00035                                         {
00036                                                 this->moves.push_back(it->first);
00037                                                 this->moves.back().index = this->moves.size() - 1;
00038                                         }
00039                                         if(it->second.fun)
00040                                         {
00041                                                 this->moves.push_back(it->second);
00042                                                 this->cancellations[this->moves.size()-1] = this->moves.size()-2;
00043                                                 this->cancellations[this->moves.size()-2] = this->moves.size()-1;
00044                                                 this->moves.back().index = this->moves.size() - 1;
00045                                         }
00046                                 }
00047                         }
00048 
00055                         virtual void traverse(Cube state, Examiner &examiner) = 0;
00056                         virtual void setVerbosity(bool);
00057         };
00058 }

00060 #endif
